body.name: Full HD Webcam with Built-in Microphone and Rotatable Tripod, 1080P Video and Wide Angle Camera, Privacy Cover, for Desktop PC or Laptop Computer (Webcam with USB Cable)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 9 hrs 2 mins
features: Full HD Video and Wide Angle Lens - The Tewiky High Definition 1080p Webcam features a wide angle lens and delivers crisp clear images and fluid video at 30 frames per second while gaming, video calling, online teaching, live streaming, or recording.

Built-In Noise - Cancelling Microphone - The noise-canceling microphone reduces background noise to enhance the sound quality of your video. Even in noisy surroundings, viewers can hear your voice loud and clear. Great for webinars, video conferencing, and live streaming.

Automatic Light Correction - The camera components is equipped with automatic light correction technology and can automatically adjust the image brightness and restore color according to the ambient light, helping you achieve the best optical effect.

Easy Plug and Play - Our easy-to-operate HD webcam works with USB 2.0, USB 3.0 and USB 3.1 and doesn't require you to download additional drivers and it comes equipped with a 3ft USB power cable. Just plug the webcam into the USB port of your devices and use it right away!

Wide Compatibility and Versatility - The Tewiky HD Webcam can be used with desktop PCs, laptops, tablets, Android phones, and other UVC protocol devices. It is compatible with multiple operating systems, including Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac iOS, Vista, Linux 2.6 or later.

Detachable Tripod and Privacy Cover - Easily set up your web cam with the flexible tripod or use the built-in clip to attach the webcam directly to your devices. The privacy cover flips closed to cover the lens, protecting your privacy and shielding the lens from dust and scratches.

productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,769 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With Privacy Cover The privacy cover flips closed to cover the lens when it is not in use, protecting your privacy and shielding the lens from dust and scratches. Simple and convenient operation. It provides users with clear, professional video while live streaming. 120° Degrees Wide-Angle view The 120° ultra wide-angle lens shows even more of your scene than a normal camera, when shown on display you can really get the most from your images. This makes it perfect for conferences, presentations, or other activity. Flexible Clip With the 100° rotatable clip, You can easily adjust the angle of the webcam clip and the lens to your computer. Angle the clip for the most stable position, with the webcam tilted up or down for the best view.

Video Calling With Family Web cam provides premium quality video that makes you like a pro, connect with everyone in FULL HD 1080P at a fluid 30 frames/sec on most popular video calling apps. Perfect for Video Calls/Working from Home. Good For Video Conferencing Great for webinars, video conferencing, etc.The built-in Noise-canceling microphone reduces ambient noise to enhance the sound quality of your video. Even in noisy surroundings you can capture the sounds you want. Suitable For Live Streaming Equipped with automatic white balance and automatic low light correction function. Even when recording in dim or poorly backlit settings the camera will intelligently adjust to produce the best possible image.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality for the price !
reviews.reviewText: The installation was pretty straight forward, just plug into USB and works right away. I'm impressed with the quality of both the camera and video recording. You don't need to adjust lighting or focus manually, it does it all automatically. It came with a small tripod but it also has a rotatable clip to put on a monitor. I have not used the microphone since I own a headset and I recommend you do the same for calls or streaming. Overall I highly recommend you try this webcam out whether its for streaming, video calls, or videos in general. You can't beat the quality for that price. 5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t have high hopes for this given the excellent price. But wow! Great picture, very easy to assemble and I love how you can either use the tripod stand included or hang on the top of the monitor. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very nice and works well.
reviews.reviewText: the camera is clear and is 1080p, and the mic is great quality, I had to use it because my headset mic wasn't working and it is very nice to have the mic not Infront of my face because i am usually gaming with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought maybe this would be cheap connection while using it but it amazingly connects well in every way. To plug in to connect and use. To the quality of use and seeing others specifically when they move their is no lagging. This was awesome and the fact it’s on a rotating tripod so I don’t have to reposition it when I move but just turn it was awesome. Obviously it doesn’t move on its own so I mean you don’t have to pick it up and move it when you move. Great quality and such a steal at the price you pay. No complaints here and definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Plugged in and it worked with no problems. Very easy to install and the quality is fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty awesome web cam
reviews.reviewText: I am loving this web cam... I can use it on my phone and my laptop easy peasy just plug it in and it's ready to go. The cover for the camera is awesome for when I am caring it around with me. The sound canceling works awesome. This camera has a very wide view and captures more than others I have used. This is definitely worth the money. I have already recommended it to several people once they seen mine they wanted one as well..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality but can't change basic video settings
reviews.reviewText: I plan to return it after hooking it up. It worked fine, easy install, no drivers, it just uses the default usb driver. Good picture, very clear. But I couldn't customize the picture at all. It has a wide angle lens, which even from the top of my monitor 2 feet away, gets a lot of the room behind me. I'd rather be able to zoom in so that I'm filling up the frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I like the image quality, security shutter, and that it includes a small tripod. I tried installing it on top of my computer monitor but the hinged clamp is fiddly and not tight enough to feel secure so I used the tripod and sat it on the desk. Needed it for zoom and teams meetings.

One of the reasons I selected this camera was for its ease of use. Unfortunately, this means there are no manual controls. The image was far too over exposed to use, and my room isn't very bright. I'll spend a bit more on a webcam that comes with its own driver.
This webcam is very nice and awesome. Its performance & look wins 5-Stars.
